attributes.action: Knight Bobby Moore posthumously, the Greatest Footballer this country produced
attributes.background: The greatest English footballer, who gave so much to the game, the only England captain to hold up the World Cup as a winner. A massively generous person who was not recognised while he was alive. The great Pele even called him the greatest he played against

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
